page.title: 02A Day In The Life Of Karen.
page.content: I wake up at 07.15 get up and open my curtains at 07.30.I wash myself and clean my teeth then I get dressed. Today is Thursday so I put my swimming costume on underneath my clothes. I go downstairs and have breakfast with my family.I have cereal,toast and a cup of tea.At 08.15 I go for my friends and walk up to school and play until the bell rings at 08.55.After assembly I do lessons until 09.45 then the bus takes my class to the swimming pool.We go in at 10.00 and come out at 10.45. I get on with my lessons until 12.00. I go back into the class at 13.15 and do more lessons until playtime. I have more lessons until 15.30 when I go to Gymnastics Club. At 16.30 I go home and have my tea and watch T.V. I then prepare my reading and spellings, get my supper and go to bed at 21.30.
